posts.post_content: If all slivers had shroud, wouldn't that in turn cancel their ability to have that ability since they are being targeted by another Sliver?
posts.html:
If all slivers had shroud, wouldn't that in turn cancel their ability to have that ability since they are being targeted by another Sliver?
Report Abuse  
Posted By: disgracerpg (11/11/2008 4:24:00 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Sliver abilities generally don't target other slivers. They're continuous abilities, not activatable abilities.  
  
This is the most annoying sliver ever.
posts.html:
Sliver abilities generally don't target other slivers. They're continuous abilities, not activatable abilities.

This is the most annoying sliver ever.

posts.post_content: Slivers can't be the **Target** of spells and abilities. The card doesn't target a specific sliver, but all Slivers at once. Saying that the group can't be targeted would create a paradox. It's an amusing concept though.
posts.html:
Slivers can't be the Target of spells and abilities. The card doesn't target a specific sliver, but all Slivers at once. Saying that the group can't be targeted would create a paradox. It's an amusing concept though.

posts.post_content: Does this negate the ability of Crypt Sliver?
posts.html:
Does this negate the ability of Crypt Sliver?
Report Abuse  
Posted By: packyk (7/5/2009 8:02:59 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
*Does this negate the ability of Crypt Sliver?*  
Yes it does. [Crypt Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crypt Sliver) ability says "Tap: Regenerate target sliver", and with the Crystalline Sliver out, you can no longer target slivers with spells or abilities.  
  
*Does this apply to Sliver spells as well as Sliver permanents in play?*  
If you are asking if slivers spells can still be countered with the Crystalline Sliver in play, then the answer is yes, they can still be countered. If you want counter defense with slivers, use the [Root Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Root Sliver).
posts.html:
Does this negate the ability of Crypt Sliver?
Yes it does. Crypt Sliver ability says "Tap: Regenerate target sliver", and with the Crystalline Sliver out, you can no longer target slivers with spells or abilities.

Does this apply to Sliver spells as well as Sliver permanents in play?
If you are asking if slivers spells can still be countered with the Crystalline Sliver in play, then the answer is yes, they can still be countered. If you want counter defense with slivers, use the Root Sliver.
